00050 using namespace std;
00056 class ChpCheck : public RegressionCheck {

00058 public:
00059 
00067   ChpCheck(std::vector<std::string> &generated, std::vector<std::string> &gold, 
00068            int diffAllowed=0, const std::string &prefix="apt-", double eps=0.0001,
00069            bool bCheckHeaders = true) {
00070     m_Name = "XDA-CHP-Check";
00071     m_Generated = generated;
00072     m_Gold = gold;
00073     m_Eps_confidence = eps;
00074     m_Eps_pvalue = eps;
00075     m_Eps_signal = eps;
00076     m_DiffAllowed = diffAllowed;
00077     m_Prefix = prefix;
00078     m_CheckHeaders = bCheckHeaders;
00079 
00080     fillInToIgnore(m_IgnoreMap, prefix); // things know to change like user, time, etc.
00081 
00082     setMaxError(30);
00083   }
00084   ChpCheck(const std::string &generated, const std::string &gold, 
00085            int diffAllowed=0, const std::string &prefix="apt-", double eps=0.0001,
00086            bool bCheckHeaders = true) {
00087     m_Generated.push_back(generated);
00088     m_Gold.push_back(gold);
00089     m_Eps_confidence = eps;
00090     m_Eps_pvalue = eps;
00091     m_Eps_signal = eps;
00092     m_DiffAllowed = diffAllowed;
00093     m_Prefix = prefix;
00094     m_CheckHeaders = bCheckHeaders;
00095 
00096     fillInToIgnore(m_IgnoreMap, prefix); // things know to change like user, time, etc.
00097 
00098     setMaxError(30);
00099   }

00102   bool checkFilePair(int genIdx, int goldIdx, std::string &msg)
00103   {
00104     bool success = true;
00105      try {
00106             m_Generated[genIdx] = Util::convertPathName(m_Generated[genIdx].c_str());
00107             m_Gold[goldIdx] = Util::convertPathName(m_Gold[goldIdx].c_str());
00108             if (m_CheckHeaders && !headersSame(m_Generated[genIdx], m_Gold[goldIdx], msg))
00109               success = false;
00110             if(!dataSame(m_Generated[genIdx], m_Gold[goldIdx], msg)) {
00111               success = false;
00112             }
00113           } // end try
00114           catch(Except &e) {
00115             success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: " + ToStr(e.what()),msg);
00116           }
00117           catch(const std::exception &e) {
00118             success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: standard exception: " + ToStr(e.what()),msg);
00119           }
00120           catch(...) {
00121             success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: Uncaught Exception.",msg);
00122           }
00123           return success;
00124   }
00130   bool check(std::string &msg) {
00131     bool success = true;
00132     if(m_Generated.size() != m_Gold.size()) {
00133       return checkMsg(false, "CelCheck::check() - generated and gold vectors must be same size.",msg);
00134     }
00135 
00136     if(m_Generated.size() == 1 && m_Generated.size() == 1)
00137       {
00138         success = this->checkFilePair(0,0,msg);
00139       }
00140     else
00141       {
00142         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Generated.size(); i++) 
00143           {
00144             success = this->checkFilePair(i,i,msg);
00145         }
00146       }
00147     return success;
00148   }
00149 
00153   void clearHeaderIgnore() {
00154       m_IgnoreMap.clear();
00155   }
00156 
00161   void addHeaderIgnore(std::string &key) {
00162       m_IgnoreMap.insert(key);
00163   }

00165 private:
00166   
00167   // Header entries to ignore
00168   static void fillInToIgnore(std::set<std::string> &ignoreMap, const std::string &prefix) {
00169     ignoreMap.clear();
00170     ignoreMap.insert("program-version");
00171     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + "exec-guid");
00172     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + "analysis-guid");
00173     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + "time-str"); 
00174     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + "free-mem");    
00175     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + "cvs-id");
00176     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + "version");
00177     //ignoreMap.insert(prefix + "opt-out-dir");
00178     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + "opt-analysis-spec");
00179   }
00180 
00193   bool tagValuePairMostlySame(TagValuePairTypeList &gold, TagValuePairTypeList &test, std::string &msg) {
00194     bool same = true;
00195     map<string,string> testMap;
00196     map<string,string>::iterator testMapIter;
00197     TagValuePairTypeList::iterator testIter;
00198     // Load up test as a map which will be queried by items in gold.
00199     for(testIter = test.begin(); testIter != test.end(); ++testIter) {
00200       testMap[testIter->Tag] = testIter->Value;
00201     }
00202     TagValuePairTypeList::iterator goldIter;
00203     for(goldIter = gold.begin(); goldIter != gold.end(); ++goldIter) {
00204       // ignore items that are in the ignoreMap
00205       if(m_IgnoreMap.find(goldIter->Tag) == m_IgnoreMap.end()) {
00206         testMapIter = testMap.find(goldIter->Tag);
00207         if(testMapIter == testMap.end()) {
00208           msg += " Error: Test missing field: '" + ToStr(goldIter->Tag) + "'";
00209           same = false;
00210         }
00211         else {
00212           if(testMapIter->second != goldIter->Value &&
00213              Util::fileRoot(testMapIter->second) != Util::fileRoot(goldIter->Value)) {
00214             msg += " Error: for field '" + goldIter->Tag + "' expecting: '" + goldIter->Value + 
00215               "' got: '" + testMapIter->second + "'";
00216             same = false;
00217           }
00218         }
00219       }
00220     }
00221     return same;
00222   }
00223   
00224   bool headersSame(const std::string &generated, const std::string &gold, std::string &msgs) {
00225     bool success = true;
00226     affxchp::CCHPFileData generatedChp, goldChp;
00227     affxchp::CCHPFileHeader genHdr, goldHdr;
00228     generatedChp.SetFileName(generated.c_str());
00229     goldChp.SetFileName(gold.c_str());
00230     if(!generatedChp.ReadHeader()) {
00231       success = false;
00232           success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: Can't read CHP Header" + ToStr(generated) + " error is: " + generatedChp.GetError(), msgs);
00233           return success;
00234     }
00235     if(!goldChp.ReadHeader()) {
00236       success = false;
00237           success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: Can't read CHP Header" + ToStr(gold) + " error is: " + goldChp.GetError(), msgs);
00238           return success;
00239     }
00240     if(success) {
00241       genHdr = generatedChp.GetHeader();
00242       goldHdr = goldChp.GetHeader();
00243       success &= checkMsg(genHdr.GetCols() == goldHdr.GetCols(), "Error: cols not the same. ", msgs);
00244       success &= checkMsg(genHdr.GetRows() == goldHdr.GetRows(), "Error: rows not the same. ", msgs);
00245       success &= checkMsg(genHdr.GetNumProbeSets() == goldHdr.GetNumProbeSets(), "Error: NumProbeSets not the same. ", msgs);
00246       success &= checkMsg(genHdr.GetChipType() == goldHdr.GetChipType(), "Error: ChipType not the same. ", msgs);
00247       success &= checkMsg(genHdr.GetAlgVersion() == goldHdr.GetAlgVersion(), "Error: AlgVersion not the same. ", msgs);
00248       success &= checkMsg(genHdr.GetProgID() == goldHdr.GetProgID(), "Error: ProgID not the same. ", msgs);
00249       success &= checkMsg(genHdr.GetAssayType() == goldHdr.GetAssayType(), "Error: Assay Type not the same. ", msgs);
00250 
00251       TagValuePairTypeList &goldList = goldHdr.AlgorithmParameters();
00252       TagValuePairTypeList &genList = genHdr.AlgorithmParameters();
00253       bool paramSame = tagValuePairMostlySame(goldList, genList, msgs);
00254       success &= paramSame;
00255 
00256       goldList = goldHdr.SummaryParameters();
00257       genList = genHdr.SummaryParameters();
00258       paramSame = tagValuePairMostlySame(goldList, genList, msgs);
00259       success &= paramSame;
00260     }
00261     return success;
00262   }
00263 
00264   bool dataSame(const std::string &generated, const std::string &gold, std::string &msgs) {
00265     bool success = true;
00266     double maxDiffConf = -1;
00267     double maxDiffPval = -1;
00268     double maxDiffSignal = -1;
00269     int numDiff = 0;
00270 
00271     affxchp::CCHPFileData generatedChp, goldChp;
00272     affxchp::CCHPFileHeader genHdr, goldHdr;
00273     generatedChp.SetFileName(generated.c_str());
00274     goldChp.SetFileName(gold.c_str());
00275     if(!generatedChp.Read()) {
00276       success = false;
00277           success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: Can't read CHP" + ToStr(generated) + " error is: " + generatedChp.GetError(), msgs);
00278           return success;
00279     }
00280     if(!goldChp.Read()) {
00281       success = false;
00282           success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: Can't read CHP" + ToStr(gold) + " error is: " + goldChp.GetError(), msgs);   
00283           return success;
00284     }    
00285 
00286     genHdr = generatedChp.GetHeader();
00287     goldHdr = goldChp.GetHeader();  
00288         if (genHdr.GetAssayType() != goldHdr.GetAssayType()) {success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: Assay Types are not the same. Gold: " + gold + " " + ToStr(goldHdr.GetAssayType()) + " Generated: " + generated + " " + ToStr(genHdr.GetAssayType()), msgs); return success;}
00289         if (genHdr.GetNumProbeSets() != goldHdr.GetNumProbeSets()) {success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: Number of Probe Sets are not the same. Gold: " + gold + " " + ToStr(goldHdr.GetNumProbeSets()) + " Generated: " + generated + " " + ToStr(genHdr.GetNumProbeSets()), msgs); return success;}
00290         if(genHdr.GetAssayType() == affxchp::CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping) {
00291         for(int i = 0; i < genHdr.GetNumProbeSets(); i++) {
00292             bool localSuccess = true;
00293             affxchp::CGenotypeProbeSetResults *genResults = generatedChp.GetGenotypingResults(i);
00294             if(genResults == NULL)
00295                 Err::errAbort("Failed to get entry for test (" + ToStr(i) + "). File: " + generated + " Error: " + generatedChp.GetError());
00296             affxchp::CGenotypeProbeSetResults *goldResults = goldChp.GetGenotypingResults(i);
00297             if(goldResults == NULL)
00298                 Err::errAbort("Failed to get entry for gold (" + ToStr(i) + "). File: " + gold + " Error: " + generatedChp.GetError());
00299             if(goldResults->AlleleCall != genResults->AlleleCall) 
00300                 localSuccess = false;
00301             checkFloat(goldResults->Confidence, genResults->Confidence, m_Eps_confidence, localSuccess, maxDiffConf);
00302             checkFloat(goldResults->pvalue_AA, genResults->pvalue_AA, m_Eps_pvalue, localSuccess, maxDiffPval);
00303             checkFloat(goldResults->pvalue_AB, genResults->pvalue_AB, m_Eps_pvalue, localSuccess, maxDiffPval);
00304             checkFloat(goldResults->pvalue_BB, genResults->pvalue_BB, m_Eps_pvalue, localSuccess, maxDiffPval);
00305             checkFloat(goldResults->pvalue_NoCall, genResults->pvalue_NoCall, m_Eps_pvalue, localSuccess, maxDiffPval);
00307             //checkFloat(goldResults->RAS1, genResults->RAS1, m_Eps_ras, localSuccess, maxDiffRas);
00308             //checkFloat(goldResults->RAS2, genResults->RAS2, m_Eps_ras, localSuccess, maxDiffRas);
00309             if(!localSuccess)
00310                 numDiff++;
00311             success &= localSuccess;
00312         }
00313         if(maxDiffConf > m_Eps_confidence)
00314             Verbose::out(1, "Max diff: " + ToStr(maxDiffConf) + " is greater than expected (" + ToStr(m_Eps_confidence) + ") [confidence]");
00315         if(maxDiffPval > m_Eps_pvalue)
00316             Verbose::out(1, "Max diff: " + ToStr(maxDiffPval) + " is greater than expected (" + ToStr(m_Eps_pvalue) + ") [pvalue]");
00317         if(numDiff > 0)
00318             Verbose::out(1, ToStr(numDiff) + " of " + ToStr(genHdr.GetNumProbeSets()) + " (" + 
00319                             ToStr(100.0 * numDiff/genHdr.GetNumProbeSets()) + "%) were different.");
00320 
00321         std::string res = "different";
00322         if(success) 
00323             res = "same";
00324         Verbose::out(1, generated + ": checked " + ToStr(genHdr.GetNumProbeSets()) + " genotype entries.");
00325         Verbose::out(1, generated + ": max confidence diff is: " + ToStr(maxDiffConf));
00326         Verbose::out(1, generated + ": max pvalue diff is: " + ToStr(maxDiffPval));
00327         Verbose::out(1, generated + ": chip is " + res + ".");
00328     } else if(genHdr.GetAssayType() == affxchp::CCHPFileHeader::Expression) {
00329         for(int i = 0; i < genHdr.GetNumProbeSets(); i++) {
00330             bool localSuccess = true;
00331             affxchp::CExpressionProbeSetResults *genResults = generatedChp.GetExpressionResults(i);
00332             affxchp::CExpressionProbeSetResults *goldResults = goldChp.GetExpressionResults(i);
00333             checkFloat(goldResults->Signal, genResults->Signal, m_Eps_signal, localSuccess, maxDiffSignal);
00335             if(!localSuccess)
00336                 numDiff++;
00337             success &= localSuccess;
00338         }
00339         if(maxDiffSignal > m_Eps_signal)
00340             Verbose::out(1, "Max diff: " + ToStr(maxDiffSignal) + " is greater than expected (" + ToStr(m_Eps_signal) + ") [signal]");
00341         if(numDiff > 0)
00342             Verbose::out(1, ToStr(numDiff) + " of " + ToStr(genHdr.GetNumProbeSets()) + " (" + 
00343                             ToStr(100.0 * numDiff/genHdr.GetNumProbeSets()) + "%) were different.");
00344 
00345         std::string res = "different";
00346         if(success) 
00347             res = "same";
00348         Verbose::out(1, generated + ": checked " + ToStr(genHdr.GetNumProbeSets()) + " expression entries.");
00349         Verbose::out(1, generated + ": max signal diff is: " + ToStr(maxDiffSignal));
00350         Verbose::out(1, generated + ": chip is " + res + ".");
00351     } else {
00352         Err::errAbort("ChpCheck::ChpCheck() - unknown CHP type.");
00353     }
00354 
00355     if(!success && m_DiffAllowed >= numDiff) 
00356         success = true;
00357     if(!success)
00358       msgs += "Error: " + generated + " is different from " + gold + ". ";
00359     return success;
00360   }
00361       
00363   std::vector<std::string> m_Gold;
00365   std::vector<std::string> m_Generated;
00367   double m_Eps;
00368   double m_Eps_confidence;
00369   double m_Eps_pvalue;
00370   double m_Eps_signal;
00371   bool m_CheckHeaders;
00373   int m_DiffAllowed;
00375   std::string m_Prefix;
00377   std::set<std::string> m_IgnoreMap;
00378   
00379 };
